text:
@realDonaldTrump Received a post card, apparently from the WH, "President Trump's Coronavirus Guidelines For America"

The first line of the guidelines is 

"LISTEN AND FOLLOW THE DIRECTIONS OF YOUR STATE AND LOCAL AUTHORITIES."

The RNC should have paid for this obvious campaign pitch.
